summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3345, for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue, from 24th Avenue Northwest to the east margin of 14th Avenue Northwest and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41280 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
